dct_description_sm: This polygon data layer represents flood plains for Boulder County, Colorado in 2002. The dataset was originally published by the Boulder County Community Planning & Permitting Department in 2005.
dct_creator_sm: Boulder County Community Planning & Permitting Department
schema_provider_s: American Geographical Society Library â€“ UWM Libraries

Boulder County will not assume liability for the data contained in this website. GIS shapefiles, available for general distribution, are in Boulder County's standard projection and coordinate system. They include existing attribution, data dictionaries, descriptions and other supporting documentation. Conversions, projections, consultation and support will not be provided. If you find errors in this shapefile, please contact the Land Use GIS Manager.]
